title: "Alfabet Praema"

*Buk ia hemi ol smol pija blo soemaot difren leta, blo givhan long ol pikinini taem we oli stat blo lan blo rid. Text blo hem hemi kamaot long wan woksop wetem ol tija blo Praemeri mo Kindi araon long Saot-Is Ambrym long January 2020.*

*Mi wantem se wan manples bae i save mekem ol pija blo hem tu, be naoia i gat fiu nomo i stap we mi inkludem, we John i bin droem. Sipos yu save wan manples we bae hemi save dro gud mo bae i intres blo mekem wok ia, plis yu kontaktem mi.*
